paper_abstract: You are back from that very long, marvellous journey. You have a thousand pictures, but your friends and relatives will stand just a few dozens. Choosing is a painful process, in particular when you cannot decide between the silent vastness of that desert and the idyllic picture of that tranquil, majestic lake. We are going to help.
paper_title: Pictures from Mongolia. Extracting the Top Elements from a Partially Ordered Set
